Name: FlyeChat
Info: FlyeChat is a web-based, real time chat client, similar to Discord.

I originally started developing it at the start of 2021 in January, using Python with a client and server application, connected using the socketserver library. Since then its been redeveloped twice, using asp.net and c#.
There will be more information about FlyeChat soon, but for now:
You can it here: https://flyechatnew.azurewebsites.net/

Name: Turret Malfunction
Info: Turret Malfunction is a browser game I made with Unity for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 during lockdown, in collaberation with SirHorseIV (he designed the artwork).
You can play it here: https://flye001.itch.io/turret-malfunction

Name: FlyeWords
Info: FlyeWords is a simple word game influenced by the popular game Wordle.
I made it for fun to improve my desiging skills (so please don't sue me people that made Wordle).
You can play FlyeWords here: https://flyewords.flye001.com

Name: ETS2/ATS Trackers
Info: FlyeTracker is a system to log your deliveries in the games Euro Truck Simulator 2 & American Truck Simulator. There is a downloadable tracker software which connects to the games and logs and sends your deliveries to the server. You can then view all your deliveries online in the web application.
I have also made several custom Drivers Hubs with trackers for VTCs.
You can access FlyeTracker here: https://tracker.flye001.com

Name: Discord Bots
Info: I have made several Discord bots before in several languages, including Python and C#; some just for fun and my own use, and some for other people to buy. If you would be interested in getting a custom Discord bot for your server, feel free to message me on Discord.
You can join my Discord server here: https://discord.gg/FvvYGCjJdk

Name: Pokedex
Info: In June 2016, I embarked on my first ever real journey into development. I decided to make a real life Pokedex, powered by a Raspberry Pi.
The project turned out to be a great success, and I have made improved versions since.
If you'd like to find out more about them, there is channel in my Discord Server detailing the whole journey.
You can access that channel with this link.
